name: CallPirates - Cheap calls
description: You dont want to pay for the luxury yachts of your mobile phone providers bosses? Well, you are right!  Stand up and start saving now - up to 90% on your current phone bill by using the CallPirates VOIP app!  Use your WiFi or 3G connection to make regular VOIP calls or use our Local Access or CallBack service when your internet connection is letting you down.  We offer incredible low rates so you can call your mates across the worlds oceans!  And if you are busy handling your ship, you can send cheap text messages as well from the CallPirates android app!  So hoist the sails and install our VOIP app now!  You can create a CallPirates username in the app, if you do not have one already.   Key Features: - Easy to use - Great sound quality! - Low rates for calls and text messages - Use your android phones contacts  Using our app as a default dialer may interfere with dialing 911 emergency services.
